DOC.detailed_description: The Brazilian National Immunization Program ( PNI ) introduce oral monovalent vaccine rotavirus infant immunization schedule since 2006 . Its introduction increase Brazilian Ministry Health budget vaccination Brazil free charge . An agreement Path Foundation Butantan Institute make possible transfer technology Butantan Institute produce , reduce cost , pentavalent rotavirus vaccine include rotavirus serotypes frequent Brazil .
